data.message:
Facebook There's a friend who die Just Yesterday :'( & we want to close his Facebook !! There's any way to close it??
That is his Facebook https://www.facebook.com/Zakaria.Sentissi & Tnks

replies.message: Our sincerest condolences for your loss. When someone has passed away, it's our policy to memorialize their account. Memorialized accounts are a place for friends and family to share memories after a person has passed away and memorializing an account also helps keep it secure by preventing anyone from logging into it. You can learn more about memorialized accounts here: on.fb.me/1x3ORPz. Please let us know if you have any questions. -Jordan
So that means his Account/Profile will close forever ??
Hi there. You can learn more about memorialized accounts in our Help Center at: on.fb.me/1x3ORPz. Please let us know if you have any more questions. -Jordan
